heading: HB00091
0: AN ACT INSTITUTING A COMPULSORY INSURANCE FOR MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF ELECTION INSPECTORS FOR EVERY NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS
status: Pending with the Committee on SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00091
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INSTITUTING A COMPULSORY INSURANCE FOR MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF ELECTION INSPECTORS FOR EVERY NATIONAL AND LOCAL ELECTIONS
SHORT TITLE : Bei Insurance Act Of 2010
ABSTRACT : Entitles compulsory coverage in the insurance for all persons receiving honoraria from the Commission of Elections as Board of Election Inspectors (BEIs), irrespective of appointment, deputized by the Commission to ensure free, orderly, honest, peaceful and credible election.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CORTUNA, JULIETA R.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON SUFFRAGE AND ELECTORAL REFORMS ON 2016-07-26
